about.description:
It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats and they usually re-implement
their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.
LIEF attempts to fill this void.
about.summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO formats.

name: py-lief
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.8
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: py-lief
    version: 0.9.0
source:
    -   fn: lief-0.9.0.tar.gz
        patches:
            - 0001-Allow-building-from-released-tarball.patch
            - 0002-MSVC-Add-bigobj-flag.patch
            - 0003-Export-LIEF-Object-and-LIEF-MachO-DataCodeEntry-clas.patch
            - 0004-MachO-Fix-has_dynamic_symbol_command.patch
            - 0005-Link-Python-extension-module-to-shared-LIEF-library.patch
        sha256: 8f1a12d69d9f6bd8404d4f5809549d1c7f3138cacf3bccd1192cb4f46bfb9eb7
        url: https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/archive/0.9.0.tar.gz
build:
    number: 1
    run_exports:
        - py-lief >=0.9.0,<0.10.0a0
    string: py27hb209c28_1
requirements:
    build:
        - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.31.1 he53550c_1
        - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.31.1 he53550c_3
        - bzip2 1.0.6 h14c3975_1002
        - ca-certificates 2019.3.9 hecc5488_0
        - cmake 3.14.4 hd143910_0
        - curl 7.64.1 h60234ee_0
        - expat 2.2.5 hf484d3e_1002
        - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.2.0 he01c8ba_1
        - gcc_linux-ppc64le 8.2.0 h9f3bcec_3
        - gettext 0.19.8.1 h94c31b8_1002
        - git 2.21.0 pl526hc565e7e_0
        - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.2.0 h822a55f_1
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.2.0 h9f3bcec_3
        - krb5 1.16.3 hd2bbab6_1001
        - libcurl 7.64.1 h8f7db48_0
        - libedit 3.1.20170329 hf8c457e_1001
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb209c28_1006
        - libgcc-ng 8.2.0 h822a55f_1
        - libiconv 1.15 h6eb9509_1005
        - libssh2 1.8.2 h47f401e_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 8.2.0 h822a55f_1
        - libuv 1.29.1 h6eb9509_0
        - make 4.2.1 h14c3975_2004
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1b h6eb9509_2
        - perl 5.26.2 h6eb9509_1006
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 h14c3975_1005
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - tk 8.6.9 h84994c4_1001
        - xz 5.2.4 h14c3975_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h14c3975_1004
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2019.3.9 hecc5488_0
        - certifi 2019.3.9 py27_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb209c28_1006
        - libgcc-ng 8.2.0 h822a55f_1
        - liblief 0.9.0 h1d591a0_1
        - libstdcxx-ng 8.2.0 h822a55f_1
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1b h6eb9509_2
        - pip 19.1 py27_0
        - python 2.7.15 ha035774_1008
        - readline 7.0 hf8c457e_1001
        - setuptools 41.0.1 py27_0
        - sqlite 3.28.0 ha210b8d_0
        - tk 8.6.9 h84994c4_1001
        - wheel 0.33.4 py27_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h14c3975_1004
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=8.2.0
        - liblief 0.9.0 h1d591a0_1
        - libstdcxx-ng >=8.2.0
        - python >=2.7,<2.8.0a0
test:
    imports:
        - lief
    requires:
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.*
about:
    description: 'It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats
        and they usually re-implement

        their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.

        LIEF attempts to fill this void.

        '
    doc_source_url: https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/tree/master/doc
    doc_url: https://lief.quarkslab.com/doc/stable/index.html
    home: https://lief.quarkslab.com/
    license: Apache 2.0
    license_family: Apache
    summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO
        formats.
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - isuruf
        - mingwandroid
        - msarahan

about.description:
It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats and they usually re-implement
their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.
LIEF attempts to fill this void.
about.summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO formats.
